item.title: Archaeology
item.description: Purpose Here you will find a list of resources with very archaeology-specific applications, including slides, textbooks, and packages. You will be able to find a much more comprehensive list of resources on Ben Marwick’s CRAN Task View for archaeology. 📦 Packages install.packages() archdata rcarbon c14bazAAR evoarchdata zooaRch leastcostpath üë©‚Äçüè´ Slides Statistical inference and data exploration for archaeologists - Ben Marwick 💻 Sites and Blogs Archaeoinformatics - Sophie Schmidt Plotting dental inventory with ggplot2 - Bj√∏rn Peare Bartholdy
